name: S. Korea
description: Known for bold, fiery flavors and satisfyingly chewy noodles, Korean instant ramyun has emerged as the worldwide packaged noodle of choice. UUDU's Seoul-ful lineup includes the iconic spicy umami of Shin Ramyun to Buldak's creamy, cheesy heat ‚Äî plus other tasty options in between. It's plenty of options to indulge your Korean flavor cravings.

name: Japan
description: The birthplace of instant ramen brings refined, balanced flavors with premium ingredients. From rich tonkotsu to delicate shio broths, Japanese ramen offers sophisticated taste profiles that have perfected the art of noodle-making over decades.

name: Taiwan
description: Taiwan's innovative noodle scene features unique air-dried textures and creative flavor combinations. A-Sha's premium wheat noodles showcase the island's dedication to quality ingredients and distinctive cooking techniques.

name: Other Asia
description: Explore diverse flavors from across Asia, including Indonesia's beloved Mi Goreng, Thailand's aromatic Tom Yum, and Singapore's rich curry laksa. Each region brings its own special blend of spices and cooking traditions.

name: Toppers
description: Instant noodles are just the starting point as the real upgrade begins with UUDU‚Äôs bold toppings. From classic veggies like bok choy and popular garnishes like Flamin‚Äô Hot Cheetos to lip-smackin‚Äô proteins like Korean mini smokies. Add sauces from Kewpie mayo to UUDU‚Äôs ‚Äúrocket boosters‚Äù ‚Äî our own house-made hack blends ‚Äî, and suddenly the broth pops, the noodles hit harder, and any packet becomes a truly elevated bowl.

name: B√äV
description: Refresh your palate with drinks that complement your ramen experience. Coming soon with authentic Asian beverages and modern refreshments.

name: Snax
description: Perfect sides and snacks to round out your meal. From crispy treats to traditional accompaniments, these items enhance your ramen adventure.
